Date: {{ doc.posting_date }}


To,
Gyalsung Project Officer,
{{doc.branch}}
Gyalsung Infra
   
Subject: Submission of Imprest Recoupment.

Dear Sir, 

Please enclosed here with the Imprest fund settlement ({{doc.name}}) for {{ doc.branch }} site. The imprest fund expenditure of Nu. {{ frappe.format_value(doc.total_amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }} ( {{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.total_amount)}} ) being incurred for {{doc.remarks}}

The details of the cash memo and the hand receipts are attached for your references

Thanking You.
Yours faithfully,



{% set result = frappe.db.get_value('Employee', {'user_id': doc.owner}, ['employee_name', 'designation', 'branch']) %} {% if result %} {% set name, designation, branch = result %} {{ name }}
{{ designation }}
{{ branch }} {% else %}

No employee found for the given user ID.

{% endif %}
Gyalsung Project Officer.
{{doc.branch}}
